event.title: began with, and was for centuries

data.event: Although its territory has been inhabited since the Paleolithic Era, modern Angola originates in Portuguese colonization, which began with, and was for centuries limited to, coastal settlements and trading posts established from the 16th century onwards.
Independence was achieved in 1975 after the protracted liberation war.
That same year, Angola descended into an intense civil war that lasted until 2002.
